import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const [currentUUSlide, setCurrentUUSlide] = useState(0); const slides = [ { title: "PHARMORA - 1.0", subtitle: "NATIONAL CONFERENCE", description: "Fostering Innovation for a Healthier Tomorrow: Navigating the Future of Pharmaceutical Sciences", theme: "FIHTNFPS - 2025", date: "2025", organizer: "FACULTY OF PHARMACY, UNITED UNIVERSITY PRAYAGRAJ", backgroundImage: "/images/pharmora-1.0.png", backgroundColor: "#3498db", textColor: "#ffffff" }, { title: "UNITED UNIVERSITY", subtitle: "EXCELLENCE IN EDUCATION", description: "A dynamic and emerging multidisciplinary institution, established under the Private University Act and duly approved by the State Government", theme: "Promoting Excellence in Education, Research, and Training", date: "2025", organizer: "ARTS, SCIENCES, COMMERCE, ENGINEERING, MANAGEMENT, AGRICULTURE", backgroundImage: "/images/uu1.png" }, { title: "PRAYAGRAJ", subtitle: "CITY OF PRIME MINISTERS", description: "One of India's most ancient and sacred cities, known as Sangam City, famous for hosting the world's largest religious gathering - Kumbh Mela", theme: "Rich Heritage, Magnificent Architecture, Spiritual Atmosphere", date: "2025", organizer: "CONFLUENCE OF GANGA, YAMUNA & SARASWATI", backgroundImage: "/images/chandrashekhar azad.png" }, { title: "FUTURE OF PHARMACY", subtitle: "INNOVATION & TECHNOLOGY", description: "Exploring cutting-edge pharmaceutical technologies, AI in drug discovery, personalized medicine, and the evolving role of pharmacists in healthcare", theme: "Advancing Pharmaceutical Sciences Through Technology", date: "2025", organizer: "NEXT GENERATION PHARMACEUTICAL PROFESSIONALS", backgroundImage: "/images/uu1.png" } ]; const universityImages = [ "/images/uu1.png", "/images/uu2.png", "/images/uu3.png", "/images/uu4.png", "/images/uu5.png", "/images/uu6.png" ]; useEffect(() => { const slideTimer = setInterval(() => { setCurrentSlide(prev => (prev + 1) % slides.length); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(slideTimer); }, [slides.length]); useEffect(() => { const uuSlideTimer = setInterval(() => { setCurrentUUSlide(prev => (prev + 1) % universityImages.length); }, 3000); return () => clearInterval(uuSlideTimer); }, [universityImages.length]); const nextSlide = () => { setCurrentSlide(prev => (prev + 1) % slides.length); }; const prevSlide = () => { setCurrentSlide(prev => (prev - 1 + slides.length) % slides.length); }; const goToSlide = (index) => { setCurrentSlide(index); }; return (
{slides.map((slide, index) => (

{index === 0 ? ( U {slide.title} ) : ( {slide.title} )}

{slide.subtitle}
{slide.date}
ORGANIZED BY

{slide.organizer}

"{slide.description}"

{slide.theme}
))}
{slides.map((_, index) => (
{/* University Welcome Section */}

WELCOME TO UNITED UNIVERSITY PRAYAGRAJ

A Legacy of Excellence & Innovation

For decades, the United Group of Institutions has stood as a beacon of educational excellence, nurturing minds and shaping futures across diverse academic disciplines. From humble beginnings to becoming a prestigious multidisciplinary university, our journey reflects unwavering commitment to quality education, research innovation, and holistic development.

Our legacy is built on the foundation of academic integrity, industry relevance, and social responsibility. We have consistently evolved with changing times, embracing cutting-edge technologies and pedagogical approaches while maintaining our core values of excellence, ethics, and empowerment. Today, United University stands proud as a dynamic institution that bridges the gap between traditional wisdom and contemporary innovation.

25+ Years of Excellence
10,000+ Alumni Worldwide
50+ Academic Programs
{universityImages.map((image, index) => (
))}
{universityImages.map((_, index) => (
))}

ABOUT UNITED UNIVERSITY

United University is a dynamic and emerging multidisciplinary institution, established under the Private University Act and duly approved by the State Government. The university has been founded with a vision to promote excellence in education, research, and training across a wide range of academic disciplines including Arts, Sciences, Commerce, Engineering, Management, Agriculture, and Mass Communication.

Committed to academic innovation and holistic development, United University strives to be at the forefront of learning, teaching, and research. With a strong emphasis on quality education and industry relevance, the university aims to nurture skilled professionals who will contribute meaningfully to national growth and global progress.

ABOUT FACULTY OF PHARMACY

Established in 2023, the Faculty of Pharmacy at United University proudly offers Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm) and Diploma in Pharmacy (D.Pharm) programs with annual intakes of 100 and 60 students, respectively. These programs are meticulously designed to foster academic excellence, practical proficiency, and industry readiness.

Our graduates are well-prepared for dynamic career paths across pharmaceutical manufacturing, quality assurance, marketing, regulatory affairs, research and development, healthcare institutions, and prestigious government sectors such as the Food and Drug Administration. With the growing demand for skilled pharmacy professionals, our mission is to bridge the gap between industry and academia through cutting-edge education and hands-on training.

The Faculty is equipped with state-of-the-art laboratories, in the well Pharmacy building of United University (PCL) guidelines, featuring modern instrumentation, advanced simulation software, and digital learning tools. This infrastructure ensures our students gain real-time industry exposure within an academic setting. Our biggest strength lies in our highly qualified, dedicated faculty and staff, who are passionate about mentoring students and nurturing the next generation of pharmacy professionals.

Recognized for our academic integrity and industry connections, we are dedicated to developing competent, ethical, and innovative leaders in the field of pharmaceutical sciences.

ABOUT THE CONFERENCE

FIHTNFPS - 2025

Aims to bring together leading academicians, researchers, healthcare professionals and industry experts to explore transformative ideas and technological advancements shaping the future of pharmaceutical sciences. In an era marked by rapid scientific progress and global health challenges, the pharmaceutical sector stands at a crucial intersection of innovation and responsibility.

This conference provides a dynamic platform to share cutting-edge research, foster interdisciplinary collaborations, and promote sustainable solutions that enhance healthcare delivery and drug development. Key themes will include advancements in drug discovery and delivery, regulatory science, nanotechnology, personalized medicine, artificial intelligence in pharma, phytopharmaceuticals, and the evolving role of pharmacists in public health.

Special focus will also be placed on fostering entrepreneurship, start-up ecosystems, and global partnerships that accelerate translational research from bench to bedside. Through keynote addresses, plenary sessions, panel discussions, poster presentations, and networking forums, participants will gain valuable insights into emerging trends and technologies that are revolutionizing the pharmaceutical landscape.

Join us in this collaborative journey as we navigate the future of pharmaceutical sciences and work towards fostering innovation for a healthier tomorrow.

); }; export default Home;
